attributes.action: Have extra black bin days during school holidays
attributes.additional_details: to helps parents of more than one child bins tend to overflow much quicker because all of our families are home
attributes.background: Add extra black bin days for the school holidays

rejection.details:
Decisions about local waste collection, including frequency of collections, are a matter for indiviudal local authorities, not the Government or House of Commons.

You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
